unnormalised: Athlete biographies offer valuable insights. Dr. Sharma's biography of Milkha Singh is inspiring. Understanding their journeys, like P.T. Usha's struggles in Kerala, motivates young athletes. The NSNIS Patiala plays a key role. Details like training regimes (e.g., running 10 km daily) or investments (Rs. 5 Lakhs in a 1200 sq ft gym) add depth. More biographies are needed.
normalised: Athlete biographies offer valuable insights. Doctor Sharma's biography of Milkha Singh is inspiring. Understanding their journeys, like P T Usha's struggles in Kerala, motivates young athletes. The N S N I S Patiala plays a key role. Details like training regimes (for example, running ten kilometer daily) or investments (rupees five Lakh in a one thousand two hundred square feet gym) add depth. More biographies are needed.
